trans-unit.source: There are no finishers or finisher options in the current form definition.

If set, this label will be shown as first option.
The email addresses and names of the website visitors to which the email should be sent.
The email address of the sender (e.g. your company's email address) which appears in the website visitor email client.
The name of the sender (e.g. your company's name) which appears in the website visitor email client.
If enabled, the email will contain a plaintext and an HTML part, otherwise only a plaintext part.
The title, being shown in the Email. The title is rendered in the header section right above the email body. Do not confuse this field with the subject of your email.
The email addresses and names of the recipients to which the email should be sent (e.g. your company's email addresses).

The email address of the sender which appears in your email client. If you want, you can use the "insert formelement identifier" dropdown to choose a form element which holds the website visitors email address.

The name of the sender which appears in your email client. If you want, you can use the "insert formelement identifier" dropdown to choose one or more form elements which holds the website visitors name.
If enabled, the email will contain a plaintext and an HTML part, otherwise only a plaintext part.
The title, being shown in the Email. The title is rendered in the header section right above the email body. Do not confuse this field with the subject of your email.
You can use a content element identifier as URL fragment or set a custom fragment identifier.
Will be ignored if "Content element" is set
Save the mail to the Database
impp - URL representing an instant messaging protocol endpoint
tel-country-code - Country code component of the telephone number
tel-national - Telephone number without the county code
tel-area-code - Area code component of the telephone number
tel-local - Telephone number without the country code and area code component
tel-extension - Telephone number internal extension code
new-password - A new password to create / change
current-password - Current password for the selected username
Error message which is shown if the validation does not succeed
Specify the number of days between each occurrence of this event.

Your servers' maximum upload file size is {0}. Be aware setting higher values can result in errors when submitting the form. If you need higher values contact your administrator for help.
